title: Sonny Digital on Signing to Generation Now, 21 Savage, Travis Scott & More
description:
Sonny Digital returns to update Adam on all the amazing things he's been working on, his own music, his studio, explains how a bad contract slowed him down for a few years and more! ----- 00:00 Intro 8:55 Signing with Generation Now 10:10 Uzi and Drama situation kept under wraps, never put anyone in the middle 11:00 Beatopia 12:08 Seddy snuck in the legendary studio and made his way to the crew 20:53 Finding talent was always an easy thing for Sonny 21:46 Sonny wants his own career now 25:35 Sonny was stuck in a bad deal for 7 years, signed to Bang Village before he popped off 26:31 Went to court to get out of his contract, Sonny won by default 41:10 ATL has been going through some rough moments lately 44:00 Having a super close relationship with Metro Boomin 47:05 Super willing to help younger producers 49:30 The undeniable growth of 21 Savage 52:34 Worked with Travis since day one, and witnessing the growth is amazing 57:06 Sonny has a club in the back of his studio 1:00:13 Sonny says girls are the worst when they use the the bathroom, they throw ANYTHING down the toilet ----- Shout to our Partners at Gamer Supps! ORDER YOUR FREE SAMPLE TODAY with our Promo Code NoJumper https://youtu.be/UUwcj1YC-NE Gamer Supps offers esports athletes, gamers, and podcasters the most effective and healthy energy choice to help them perform at the highest potential especially during their most crucial moments. Follow us on Social Media: https://www.snapchat.com/discover/No_... http://www.twitter.com/nojumper http://www.instagram.com/nojumper https://www.facebook.com/NOJUMPEROFFI... http://www.reddit.com/r/nojumper JOIN THE DISCORD: https://discord.gg/Q3XPfBm Follow Adam22: https://www.tiktok.com/@adam22 http://www.twitter.com/adam22 http://www.instagram.com/adam22 adam22hoe on Snapchat
